message: Bob, I believe this product would be incredibly valuable to you, and I'm offering it to you first. I'm willing to part with it for $1,000,000.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but my budget is limited. I am willing to pay up to $800,000 for the product. Please let me know if this is within your considerations.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but the value of this product to you is significant. I'm willing to come down slightly to $950,000.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After careful consideration, I am still interested in acquiring the product. However, I am unable to meet the price of $950,000. I am willing to pay $875,000 for the product. I hope this offer is acceptable to you.
Bob, I understand your position, but I need to be closer to my valuation for this deal to make sense. My final offer is $900,000.

Thank you for your continued negotiation, Alice. I've reviewed our previous discussions and am willing to increase my offer to $887,500 for the product. This is my final offer before considering an alternative seller.
